feed.title: kwy95
feed.subtitle: This is my personal blog and logbook. It was created to document my experiences during the 2022 GSoC.

entry.title: GSoC Starter: kw lore interface
entry.summary: It is June 13, 2022 and it marks the official beginning of the GSoC coding period. I was accepted as a contributor in the program to contribute to the Kernel Workflow (kw) tool. My project proposes the implementation of an interface to access and download patches that have been sent to the Linux kernel public mailing lists and are available via the lore archive, and also integrate it with the c...
